00031 
00032 // Note: no #ifdef mrSwizzle_h should be used here as this
00033 //       file may end up being included multiple times
00034 
00035 // Undef all macros (to avoid redef's if present)
00036 #include "mrUnSwizzle.h"
00037 
00038 //
00039 // Simple macros to define rgb/xyz swizzling for color/vector classes
00040 // Note that unlike NVidia's swizzle operator, these macros allow
00041 // swizzling return values and the swizzling cannot be used for
00042 // assignment.  That is:
00043 //
00044 // vector a,b(1,2,3);
00045 // a = b.yzx();       // Valid. a=(2,3,1)
00046 // a.yzx( b );        // Valid. Same as above, but more efficient
00047 // a.yzx( b.xxx() );  // Valid. Not very efficient.
00048 // a.yzx() = b;       // INVALID - Compile error.
00049 //
00050 
00052 // THREE CHANNELS SWIZZLES
00054 #define swizzle(r,g,b) \
00055     inline self  r ## g ## b()  const { return self( r, g, b ); };
00056 
00057 // Swizzle and assign with swizzles
00058 #define swizzlea(r,g,b) \
00059     inline self  r ## g ## b()  const { return self( r, g, b ); }; \
00060     inline const self&  r ## g ## b(const self& t) { \
00061             r = t[0]; g = t[1]; b = t[2]; return *this; \
00062     };
00063 
00064 
00065 // 2 same channels
00066 #define swizzle2(x,y,z) \
00067       swizzle(y,x,x); \
00068       swizzle(z,x,x); \
00069       swizzle(x,y,x); \
00070       swizzle(x,z,x); \
00071       swizzle(x,x,y); \
00072       swizzle(x,x,z);
00073 
00074 //
00075 // Macros to define rgba swizzling for color classes
00076 //
00077 
00078 // flipped channels
00079 #define swizzle1_4c(r,g,b,a) \
00080       swizzlea(b,r,g); swizzlea(g,b,r); swizzlea(r,b,g); \
00081       swizzlea(b,g,r); swizzlea(g,r,b); swizzlea(r,a,b); swizzlea(r,b,a); \
00082       swizzlea(b,a,g); swizzlea(g,a,r); swizzlea(r,a,g); \
00083       swizzlea(b,g,a); swizzlea(g,r,a); swizzlea(r,g,a);
00084 
00085 // 2 same channels
00086 #define swizzle2_4c(r,g,b,a) \
00087       swizzle(g,r,r); \
00088       swizzle(b,r,r); \
00089       swizzle(a,r,r); \
00090       swizzle(r,g,r); \
00091       swizzle(r,b,r); \
00092       swizzle(r,a,r); \
00093       swizzle(r,r,g); \
00094       swizzle(r,r,b); \
00095       swizzle(r,r,a);
00096 
00097 
00099 // FOUR CHANNELS SWIZZLES
00101 
00102 #define comment1(r,g,b,a) \
00103 
00104 
00105 #define swizzle_4c4(r,g,b,a) \
00106   comment1(r,g,b,a); \
00107   inline color  r ## g ## b ## a ## () { return color( r, g, b, a ); };
00108 
00109 // Swizzle and assign with swizzles
00110 #define swizzle_4c4a(r,g,b,a) \
00111   comment1(r,g,b,a); \
00112   inline color  r ## g ## b ## a ## () { return color( r, g, b, a ); }; \
00113   inline const self&  r ## g ## b ## a ## (const miColor& t) { \
00114    r = t.r; g = t.g; b = t.b; a = t.a; return *this; };
00115 
00116 
00117 // 3 same channels
00118 #define swizzle3_4c4(r,g,b,a) \
00119       swizzle_4c4(r,r,r,g); \
00120       swizzle_4c4(r,r,r,b); \
00121       swizzle_4c4(r,r,r,a); \
00122       swizzle_4c4(r,r,g,r); \
00123       swizzle_4c4(r,r,b,r); \
00124       swizzle_4c4(r,r,a,r); \
00125       swizzle_4c4(r,g,r,r); \
00126       swizzle_4c4(r,b,r,r); \
00127       swizzle_4c4(r,a,r,r); \
00128       swizzle_4c4(g,r,r,r); \
00129       swizzle_4c4(b,r,r,r); \
00130       swizzle_4c4(a,r,r,r);
00131 
00132 // TWICE REPEATED CHANNELS
00133 #define swizzle2_4c4(r,g,b,a) \
00134       swizzle_4c4(r,r,g,b); \
00135       swizzle_4c4(r,r,b,g); \
00136       swizzle_4c4(r,r,a,g); \
00137       swizzle_4c4(r,r,g,a); \
00138       swizzle_4c4(r,r,a,b); \
00139       swizzle_4c4(r,r,b,a); \
00140       swizzle_4c4(g,r,r,b); \
00141       swizzle_4c4(b,r,r,g); \
00142       swizzle_4c4(g,r,r,a); \
00143       swizzle_4c4(a,r,r,g); \
00144       swizzle_4c4(b,r,r,a); \
00145       swizzle_4c4(a,r,r,b); \
00146       swizzle_4c4(g,b,r,r); \
00147       swizzle_4c4(b,g,r,r); \
00148       swizzle_4c4(a,b,r,r); \
00149       swizzle_4c4(b,a,r,r); \
00150       swizzle_4c4(a,g,r,r); \
00151       swizzle_4c4(g,a,r,r);
00152 
00153 // flipped channels
00154 #define swizzle1_4c4(r,g,b,a) \
00155       swizzle_4c4a(r,g,b,a); \
00156       swizzle_4c4a(r,g,a,b); \
00157       swizzle_4c4a(r,b,g,a); \
00158       swizzle_4c4a(r,b,a,g); \
00159       swizzle_4c4a(r,a,b,g); \
00160       swizzle_4c4a(r,a,g,b); \
00161       swizzle2_4c4(r,g,b,a); \
00162       swizzle3_4c4(r,g,b,a);
